title: I can't get any keys...?
body:
Dear Riot,

I was banned for two weeks about a month and a half ago, and two weeks ago I received a notice that my honor was now unlocked and I could start climbing my honor back up again. Well, over the past two weeks I have gotten at least five games with three honors, have not been toxic in chat, and am still not even honor level one. I have gotten 5 chests, but 0 key fragments. I currently have 9 chests and no keys to open them. I don't know if this is bugged, but either way, it is an incredible pain in the butt and I would appreciate some form of explanation for this unfortunate occurrence.

replies.body: Consistency is key!  Keep it up and your progress will continue to climb.  It's not just the amount of honors you receive, but showing that you can perform this way constantly.

>
> Consistency is key!  Keep it up and your progress will continue to climb.  It's not just the amount of honors you receive, but showing that you can perform this way constantly.

The key fragments seem to come so slowly now. Here's a crazy idea. If your honor is high enough to receive keys, and you get an S- or better with a champ you have already earned a chest for that season, you get an instant key fragment instead of a chest. That way you are still getting rewarded for good games with the champ. Seems a simple solution to me.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I have a similar problem except mine extends over 4 months ago.  I have not been able to raise my honor level from 0 from a chat ban I got 4 months ago.  I've gotten many many honors from teammates over that time and to be still sitting at 0 after 4 months Is alarming.

Hello, I have had similar issue but I'm honor 5. I made a discussion sort of why are we receiving random amount of keys at random times. I had a lot of people give their view on it but at the end of the day, it fields so unfair and unbalanced. When you get a key fragment drop, you only get 2 and you need 3 to make a whole key. For me, it just feels like forcing us to buy Hextech keys because we dont know when the next drop is and how much. I just see this as them trying to make more money from the successful Hextech Crafting and its disappointing.
